forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 46. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the hours of night lightly relinquish their hold on Downtown San Francisco, a cool and crisp atmosphere envelops the city, comforting the quiet streets. Currently, the sky hints at a partial veil of cloud cover, promising a transition to clearer skies as dawn approaches. As dawn breaks, expect a welcoming change; Wednesday will gift the city with glorious sunshine, ushering in temperatures that hover around a refreshing 58 degrees before easing down to a cooler 54 by afternoon. The gentle north northwest breeze will invite you to step outside, yet it is best to wear layers, as the morning chill and afternoon sun will dance with your comfort.

As the sun ascends, it looks to reveal the beautiful contours of familiar landmarks, giving way to scenic views over the Bay. On this pleasant day, it may not be the ideal moment for a long hike, but a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or a visit to the bustling Ferry Building will surely invigorate the spirit. Take a moment to savor a warm beverage from a local café, letting the aromatic scents mingle with the fresh air. The absence of fog allows the city’s charm to shine through, inviting exploration, reflection, and perhaps a quiet moment to watch the world wake from its slumber.
